name: Bombers Online
description:
Bombers is a Free to Play Multiplayer air fight game.

Shoot down other players and bomb their ships.

Play with up to 8 players in a room and fly epic air fights.

► Features ◄

▶ Collect experience and rank up

▶ Leaderboards

▶ Achievement

▶ Statistiks

► 3 Game Modes ◄

▶ Faceoff

▶ Engagement

▶ Duel

► Room settings◄

▶ Limit players level

▶ Limit players

▶ Set map size

▶ Set Game Mode

Bombers is currently in alpha version, things will be added and may change.

Bombers saves your data only for user authentication.
